title: Nancy Grace Killer Reads: The Hunting Wives
itunes:title: Nancy Grace Killer Reads: The Hunting Wives
description:
From the high life in Chicago to small town life in Texas, Sophie O'Neil and her family are reinventing their lives, but just because you don't live in the big city doesn't mean trouble can't find you. In May Cobb's new book, THE HUNTING WIVES, trouble finds O’Neill and her clique of new friends. It will be up to her to discover whether they are experiencing trouble or causing it. Joining Nancy Grace and author May Cobb for their discussion of THE HUNTING WIVES. NANCY GRACE: Killer Reads.




Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
